column4: I have an ethernet bridge on ubuntu, and ubuntu suddenly can't see the internet, but can see other computers on the network. anyone have any advice? map of my setup is www.puargs.net/helpmeplease.PNG
what is the gateway computer?
gateway computer is a router
check that image, it should show you what's happening
can you pastebin the output of 'route' command on ubuntu machine?
yes one sec
www.puargs.net/route.txt
hrm that looks pretty well right offhand.  so neither ubuntu or the pc behind it can get to internet?
i'm on the pc :D
through mirc
sorry, forgot to prefix the message- i'm on the pc, through mirc. :D works fine. i can even see the web server on my linux comp. just internet isn't working
(on ubuntu)
not working for ip too? like cant ping 72.14.207.99?
oh good question, lemme check right quick
no dice, Destination Host Unreachable
so it is routing issue. hrm..
yeah what's weird is i can ssh in to the linux pc from both the router AND the PC
sorry forgot to prefix again. i can ssh into ubuntu from both the router and from windows pc
when i went to bed last night, both computers were on, both could access internet just dandy... woke up this morning, both are still on, but linux can't access
tramp: i believe so. should be 192.168.1.1 ... what file do i double check? i'm pretty sure i have it
im not sure really you might post both those links in ubuntuforums sorry it looks good initially
thanks dude, no problem :D thanks for all your help
